docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: System overview
docs.text:
flowchart LR
    User --> Frontend
    Frontend --> Backend
    Backend --> Database

docs.title: System overview 2
docs.text:
flowchart TD
    Start([Start]) --> CheckLogin{User has account?}

    CheckLogin -->|Yes| EnterPassword[Enter Password]
    CheckLogin -->|No| Register[Register new account]

    EnterPassword --> CheckPass{Password correct?}
    CheckPass -->|Yes| Success([Login Success])
    CheckPass -->|No| Retry[Retry Login]

    Retry --> EnterPassword
    Register --> Success
